    • Constructor Detail

      • RegularMessageStructure

        public RegularMessageStructure(byte[] serializedMessage)
        It creates a Regular Message Structure based on a serialized message. A regular structure is a byte[] with the following format: |0|0001|payload| Magic Byte: size:1 position:0-0 value: byte 0x0 Version : size:4 position:1-4 value: int 1 Payload : size n position:5-n value: byte[] serialized by the user
        Parameters:
        serializedMessage - serialized message

      • RegularMessageStructure

        public RegularMessageStructure(byte magicByte,
                               int version,
                               byte[] payload)
        It create a It creates a Regular Message Structure
        Parameters:
        magicByte - message indicator. See RegularMessageStructure
        version - message version
        payload - message payload
